title: Pick up Apple's M3 13-inch MacBook Air with 16GB RAM, 512GB storage for $1,349
description: This M3 MacBook Air is a popular configuration due to a bump up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. And thanks to an October discount, it's on sale for $1,349.Save on Apple's upgraded MacBook Air - Image credit: AppleThe $1,349 price is available at Amazon on the 13-inch M3/16GB/512GB SSD spec in your choice of Midnight, Starlight or Space Gray. Units are in stock and can be delivered as soon as tomorrow to select locations with a Prime membership.Get the deal Continue Reading on AppleInsider
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: This M3 MacBook Air is a popular configuration due to a bump up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. And thanks to an October discount, it's on sale for $1,349.
text: Save on Apple's upgraded MacBook Air - Image credit: Apple This M3 MacBook Air is a popular configuration due to a bump up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. And thanks to an October discount, it's on sale for $1,349. The $1,349 price is available at Amazon on the 13-inch M3/16GB/512GB SSD spec in your choice of Midnight, Starlight or Space Gray. Units are in stock and can be delivered as soon as tomorrow to select locations with a Prime membership. If you're willing to wait a week, Apple Authorized Reseller Adorama has the same configuration available for $1,324 with promo code APINSIDER when you pick it up in the Midnight colorway. You can also tack on three years of AppleCare for $159, a savings of $40 off retail. Adorama is closed this week to observe Sukkot, but orders will be shipped in the order received starting Oct. 28. Additional Apple deals There are also hundreds of additional discounts in effect on MacBook Pros, desktop Macs and even the new iPad mini 7. Check out a few of the top deals across Apple resellers that are in effect this week, with a detailed selection in our Apple Price Guide. html:
Save on Apple's upgraded MacBook Air - Image credit: Apple

This M3 MacBook Air is a popular configuration due to a bump up to 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. And thanks to an October discount, it's on sale for $1,349.

The $1,349 price is available at Amazon on the 13-inch M3/16GB/512GB SSD spec in your choice of Midnight, Starlight or Space Gray. Units are in stock and can be delivered as soon as tomorrow to select locations with a Prime membership.

If you're willing to wait a week, Apple Authorized Reseller Adorama has the same configuration available for $1,324 with promo code APINSIDER when you pick it up in the Midnight colorway. You can also tack on three years of AppleCare for $159, a savings of $40 off retail.

Adorama is closed this week to observe Sukkot, but orders will be shipped in the order received starting Oct. 28.

Additional Apple deals

There are also hundreds of additional discounts in effect on MacBook Pros, desktop Macs and even the new iPad mini 7. Check out a few of the top deals across Apple resellers that are in effect this week, with a detailed selection in our Apple Price Guide.

  • This Babbel $149 lifetime deal makes learning a new language a breeze
  • Amazon launches $99 Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock deal to power your MacBook
  • Best MacBook Air deals for October 2024
